00048 /*
00049  * Read the entire file using the XML SAX parser.
00050  */
00051 bool TemplateFileReader::Read(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_template::TemplateData &templateData, bool headerOnly)
00052 {
00053         templateData.Clear();
00054 
00055         // Initialize the XML4C2 system
00056         try
00057         {
00058                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00059         }
00060         catch (const XMLException&)
00061         {
00062                 return false;
00063         }
00064 
00065         bool status = false;
00066         SAXParser* parser = new SAXParser;
00067         parser->setValidationScheme(SAXParser::Val_Never);
00068         parser->setLoadExternalDTD(false);
00069         parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
00070         parser->setDoSchema(false);
00071         parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
00072         SAXTemplateHandlers handler(&templateData, headerOnly);
00073         parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
00074         parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00075         try
00076         {
00077                 parser->parse(fileName.c_str());
00078                 int errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00079                 if (errorCount == 0)
00080                 {
00081                         status = true;
00082                         fileVersionNumber = handler.FileVersionNumber();
00083                 }
00084         }
00085         catch (SAXTemplateStopParsingException)
00086         {
00087                 status = true;
00088                 fileVersionNumber = handler.FileVersionNumber();
00089         }
00090         catch (...)
00091         {
00092                 status = false;
00093         }
00094         delete parser;
00095         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00096         return status;
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Check if the data type matches what is in the file.
00101  */
00102 bool TemplateFileReader::IsFileType(const std::string &fileName, const affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &dataTypeId)
00103 {
00104         return (TemplateFileReader::DataTypeIdentifier(fileName) == dataTypeId);
00105 }
00106 
00107 /*
00108  * Read just the first few entries to determine if this file is
00109  * of the right type. Check the magic number, version number
00110  * and data type identifier. If they all match then this is the right
00111  * type of file.
00112  */
00113 affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType TemplateFileReader::DataTypeIdentifier(const std::string &fileName)
00114 {
00115         TemplateFileReader reader;
00116         TemplateData templateData;
00117         reader.Read(fileName, templateData, true);
00118         return templateData.DataTypeIdentifier();
00119 }
